subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Shock led by 25 points entering the fourth quarter before the Liberty went on a 23-4 run to pull to 6 points behind late in the game. But Detroit held on, improving to 3-0 at home.
snippet: The Shock led by 25 points entering the fourth quarter before the Liberty went on a 23-4 run to pull to 6 points behind late in the game. But Detroit held on, improving to 3-0 at home.
